So the document on page 2 is a divorce form, MC's ex-wife probably ran off with her lover (who isn't even mentioned btw), so Mc is single, mother's husband seems to be dead, so I seriously struggle to see where the NTR is here. I guess in the end something goes wrong with her lover and the daughter goes back to try and patch things up with her family but finds her ex with her mother who chooses him and their baby over her daughter so I guess that last bit fits as NTR since her ex is with someone else and her mother chose someone instead of her but it would be an exaggeration since I think MC doesn't have feelings for her ex anymore (it's been months and he has his current lover pregnant). Also even if it qualifies as a NTR, it would be as one of the few ones that are completely justified. A bit confusing, but good shit.
Sequel perhaps???
